General.Name: Shanghai Flyco Electrical Appliance Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Flyco Electrical Appliance Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of smart and fashionable home appliances in China and internationally. It offers personal care electrical appliances, such as shavers, hair dryers, electric toothbrushes, tooth irrigators, electric hair clippers, nose hair trimmers, hair irons, etc.; household electrical appliances, including electric irons, garment steamers, humidifiers, smart health scales, hair ball trimmers, cervical spine massagers, eye protection devices, etc.; and electrical appliances comprising extension cord sockets, etc. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China. Shanghai Flyco Electrical Appliance Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shanghai Feike Investment Co., Ltd.
General.Address: No. 555, Guangfulin East Road, Shanghai, China, 201613

4.Name: Mr. Mou Dong  Liang
